alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Highland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:20PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL BROWN, NORTHWESTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 219 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Georgetown, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Mount Orab, Winchester, Sardinia, Belfast, New Market, Emerald, Russellville, Hamersville, Mowrystown, Redoak, Greenbush, Lake Waynoka, May Hill, Buford, Fincastle and New Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
